Topic.Title: Load an existing game in the web browser ?

Posts.EditableText: I was wondering : I started a game with the Windows version of Quest, and I'd like to continue it in the web browser interface. Is it possible to upload the game files, or something like this ?
Posts.HTML: I was wondering : I started a game with the Windows version of Quest, and I'd like to continue it in the web browser interface. Is it possible to upload the game files, or something like this ?

Posts.EditableText: Do you mean playing or editing a game?
Posts.HTML: Do you mean playing or editing a game?

Posts.EditableText: I mean : editing with the web version a game which has been created with the Windows version
Posts.HTML: I mean : editing with the web version a game which has been created with the Windows version

Posts.EditableText: It's been my understanding that there's currently no way to do that. If there is though, I'd love to know how to do the opposite as well.
Posts.HTML: It's been my understanding that there's currently no way to do that. If there is though, I'd love to know how to do the opposite as well.

Posts.EditableText: You can email Alex with the file and he can upload it for you. There's no way to do this yourself at the moment though.
Posts.HTML: You can email Alex with the file and he can upload it for you. There's no way to do this yourself at the moment though.

Posts.EditableText: OK, thank you very much
Posts.HTML: OK, thank you very much
